meanings.sent1: She computes the answer by adding the numbers together.
meanings.sent2: The scientist computes the trajectory of the rocket.
meanings.sent3: The student computes the solution to the math problem with ease.
meanings.sent4: His mind computes complex equations like a powerful machine.
meanings.sent5: The calculator computes the sum accurately every time.

meanings.sent1: He computes the total cost of the items in his shopping cart.
meanings.sent2: The accountant computes the company's profits at the end of the year.
meanings.sent3: The child computes how many candies he can buy with his pocket money.
meanings.sent4: Her brain computes numbers quickly like a human calculator.
meanings.sent5: The computer computes the result of the mathematical operation in seconds.

meanings.definition: To process data using a computer
meanings.sent1: The software computes the sales data to generate reports.
meanings.sent2: The server computes the requests from multiple users simultaneously.
meanings.sent3: The robot computes the information received from its sensors to navigate.
meanings.sent4: The algorithm computes the optimal route for the delivery truck.
meanings.sent5: The supercomputer computes complex simulations at incredible speeds.
